description:
**Tool Overview**:

This tool provides guidance on the availability of new Outlook features for Windows users.

**Details**:

The guide offers comprehensive insights into the new functionalities associated with the Outlook application on Windows. It includes information about build numbers, product availability, and relevant updates. Users will find a breakdown of the enhancements and how they affect their daily email and scheduling tasks. This is essential for system administrators looking to update their teams on the latest software changes and improve organizational compliance with Microsoft updates.

**Usage**:

1. Review the build numbers listed in the guide.
2. Follow the outlined steps for utilizing the new features.
3. Stay informed on product availability to support end-user needs.
